医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
解决心血管药物获取方面的不平等问题一项新的研究评估了加拿大公共药物保险计划涵盖的两种常见心血管疾病患者的药物承保报销标准在各省和地区的差异，结果显示在获得药物和治疗方面存在显着的不平等和缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Addressing-inequities-in-cardioangio-drug-access.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/Addressing-inequities-in-cardioangio-drug-access.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea095​​17d-e3ca-4b57-851c-e5eefc5b25ec Thu, 12 Dec 2024 02:02:52 -0500 Addressing inequities in cardiovascular drug access
新工具加速药物发现用于研究和治疗疾病的分子的开发越来越受到分析合成大量新分子所产生的大量数据所需的时间和特异性的负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/New-tool-accelerates-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241212/New-tool-accelerates-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2e7c372-e60e-479c-b91a-1d979747f6f0 Thu, 12 Dec 2024 01:28:14 -0500 New tool accelerates drug discovery
利用外泌体传递治疗性蛋白质渥太华医院和渥太华大学的研究人员发现了一个 18 位代码，可以让蛋白质将自己附着在外泌体上，外泌体是一种微小的细胞碎片，可以在身体各处移动并传递生化信号。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Harnessing-exosomes-to-deliver-therapeutic- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Harnessing-exosomes-to-deliver-therapeutic- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=323c0894-8129-4323-bfda-ddb19f48a54e Wed, 11 Dec 2024 23:43:37 -0500 Harnessing exosomes to deliver therapeutic proteins
英国儿童疫苗接种不平等现象日益扩大引发担忧《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项研究发现，英格兰儿童疫苗接种方面的不平等现象正在扩大，从 2019 年到 2023 年，生活在贫困程度较高地区的幼儿对五种关键疫苗的接种率持续较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Widening-childhood-vaccination-inequality-in-England-raises-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Widening-childhood-vaccination-inequality-in-England-raises-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=752821cd-bc43-4423-ab16-c2271cd9944e Wed, 11 Dec 2024 22:39:00 -0500 Widening childhood vaccination inequality in England raises concerns
新型乙型肝炎疫苗为艾滋病毒感染者提供卓越的保护根据威尔康奈尔医学研究人员领导的一项国际研究的结果，针对乙型肝炎病毒的新型疫苗在诱导对先前疫苗接种没有反应的艾滋病毒感染者中产生保护性抗体反应方面明显优于旧疫苗类型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-hepatitis-B-vaccine-offers-superior-protection-for-people-with-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-hepatitis-B-vaccine-offers-superior-protection-for-people-with-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d24c429-c43b-464a-b505-56dde31f2655 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 22:12:00 -0500 New hepatitis B vaccine offers superior protection for people with HIV
围绕具有里程碑意义的抗血小板药物试验的争议英国医学杂志 (BMJ) 今天发表的一项调查引发了人们对具有里程碑意义的临床试验 (PLATO) 的新担忧，该试验用于让阿斯利康 (AstraZeneca) 生产的抗血小板药物替卡格雷（美国为 Brilinta，欧洲为 Brilique）获得全球批准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Controversy-surrounds-landmark-anti-platelet-drug-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Controversy-surrounds-landmark-anti-platelet-drug-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0083490a-c50e-4e04-b916-7ba6ebaeeaf5 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 22:08:00 -0500 Controversy surrounds landmark anti-platelet drug trial
霍奇金淋巴瘤的改良化疗方案可减少长期副作用剑桥大学的研究人员表示，对霍奇金淋巴瘤患者的化疗方案进行简单的改变就可以减少治疗对健康造成的长期影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Modified-chemotherapy-regimen-for-Hodgkin-lymphoma-reduces-long-term-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Modified-chemotherapy-regimen-for-Hodgkin-lymphoma-reduces-long-term-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71248ada-5ed9-4f11-8b67-2d02e25b2697 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 22:07:00 -0500 Modified chemotherapy regimen for Hodgkin lymphoma reduces long-term side effects
PROSPECT-Lung 试验旨在改善可切除非小细胞肺癌患者的治疗备受期待的 PROSPECT-Lung 试验已正式启动，标志着在改善可切除非小细胞肺癌患者治疗策略方面向前迈出了重要一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/PROSPECT-Lung-trial-aims-to-improve-treatment-for-病人-with-resectable-non-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/PROSPECT-Lung-trial-aims-to-improve-treatment-for-病人-with-resectable-non-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20c2b8d0-8e30-4024-a91e-2caca709de33 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 22:00:00 -0500 PROSPECT-Lung trial aims to improve treatment for patients with resectable non-small cell lung cancer
肠道靶向抗抑郁药：对抗抑郁和焦虑的新方法我们大多数人都经历过心情和情绪对胃肠道的影响，从紧张引起的胃部“蝴蝶结”到情绪低落时食欲不振。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Gut-targeted-antidepressants-A-novel-approach-to-battle-depression-and-anxiety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/Gut-targeted-antidepressants-A-novel-approach-to-battle-depression-and-anxiety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7806e41e-c2ae-421e-b1c6-ba869a7fdc53 Wed, 11 Dec 2024 21:57:00 -0500 Gut-targeted antidepressants: A novel approach to battling depression and anxiety
新技术使激光能够更深入地穿透活组织代谢成像是一种无创方法，使临床医生和科学家能够使用激光研究活细胞，这可以帮助他们评估疾病进展和治疗反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-technique-enables-laser-light-to-penetrate-deeper-into-living-tissues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241211/New-technique-enables-laser-light-to-penetrate-deeper-into-living-tissues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=48801adf-6f11-46e9-8a14-a995262b106b Wed, 11 Dec 2024 21:54:04 -0500 New technique enables laser light to penetrate deeper into living tissues
